name: Little Home Short Story
description:
STORY
This is a short story about running out of space
Single-player atmospheric story about growing industrial city

JAM
This project for2021 Epic MegaJam
This project made by me during 2021 Epic MegaJam from scratch

PROJECT
-Unreal Engine 4.26
-39 models and 39 materials specially created for "2021 Epic MegaJam" from scratch during jam
-From zero to finish, it took 3 days
-First Jam I joined. Second game I made


OTHER
